Who Is Better Best

Better Best is a well-established training services provider, based in the Magalakwena district, that has been active in the training and education sector since 1994. The company was originally founded as a FET college offering NATED level programs but has since grown into a company that offers a variety of skills development and project management solutions to both government and private sector clients. Better Best has over the past 2 decades had the opportunity to work with major stakeholders across all sectors including Agriculture, Mining, Security, Hospitality, Business and Enterprise , Education and Development and Health and Welfare. We have also worked closely with Municipalities, Local Governments and departments providing them with training solutions and upliftment programmes targeted largely at unemployed youth.

We are accredited with several Sector Education Training Authorities Namely - Service Seta, MerSeta, Pseta, Health & Welfare, Umalusi, CHE, ETDP Seta and QCTO. Our portfolio of accreditations also includes DHET registered examination centres as well as accredited Trade Centre’s. This large portfolio of accreditations places Better Best in a position to successfully implement various projects and interventions that require a multi-facetted approach. One of our success secrets is the emphasis and attention we put on our quality of training, assessment and material. People are our product, and with our track record of more than 25000 successfully trained beneficiaries proves we strive to ensure the highest output as far as training is concerned.

Our Services

ACCREDITED TRAINING PROVIDER

As a proffesional and accredited training provider, Better Best can offer a wide variety of SAQA registered Qualifications. All our training services are ISO 9001:2008 alligned ensuring that service excellence is maintained at all time. Better Best offers full learnerships, accredited hard & soft skills programs and full apprenticeships and trade testing. Whatever your company training needs, we have you covered.

Project Management Services

Better Best boasts with more than 20 years experience in project management services within the education sector. We understand the complex dynamics involved with the implementation of development initiatives in a South African context and understand how to navigate the complexities. We have specific experience in working with the Magalakwena community, and have over years developed an understanding on how to successfully impliment projects within our community.

Qualified Team

Each member within the Better Best Management Unit carries a minimum of 10-years skills development project management experience, and holds specialized expertise in Business leadership, Project Management, Significant financial management & accounting expertise, Community stakeholder relations management (specific to Magalakwena), Data analytics & software engineering and Quality Assurance.

Learner management system

At the heart of all activities in our proposed implementation mode is our custom build LMS. In partnership with a team of web-developers, Better Best had developed a custom Management Information System specifically built for the implementation and monitoring of large-scale skills development projects. The system is designed to incorporate modern data analytics tools into the management platform in a way that enables data-driven decision making.

Better Best Management Unit: Message to Anglo

Better Best offers Anglo a team of highly professional and knowledgeable individuals, who, through their hard work, passion, dedication and perceptiveness, will drive this initiative to success. The team, with the strong backing of administrative, financial and management systems are perfectly qualified to take on this challenge and offer Anglo quality implementation and ensured on-time delivery. We stay true to our vision, and we can guarantee that under us – the envisioned project will see implementation in partnership with the best training providers ultimately leading to reaching project deliverables on-time and within budget.

“As the project management unit, we truly believe that Better Best is the perfect organization to take forward the envisioned project. We have been implementing skills development and community upliftment initiatives within the Magalakwena district for almost two decades and in doing so have developed a true passion for our community. We understand the challenges faced by our community members. Over time, we have established deep-seeded relationships with the various community structures, and we are excited about upliftment initiatives aimed at overcoming the various challenges faced by our people. We would love to be part of this implementation and can guarantee that we will bring passion and dedication to the implementation of this project.” – Better Best Management Unit

Over 20 years ago Better Best was founded with a simple vision. A vision of a company that can impact and enrich lives by means of education and job creation initiatives. A vision of making an impact, not only in the lives of the individuals we touch, but at a macro community scale. This vision over the past 20 years have taken shape, and Better Best grew into a renowned Professional Service Provider working hand in hand with private and public enterprise on initiatives impacting hundreds of thousands of lives. Over time, we have adopted a change mindset to stay at the forefront of our industry, and today we have the ability to combine a team of multiskilled professionals to bring experience and technology together enhancing services delivery in ways never before thought possible. This is achieved by incorporating software engineering and data analytics expertise into the management unit, resulting in the development of a custom online management system aimed projects such as this one.
